lines.text: Scarletts! They're all Scarletts! We're up to our butts in Scarletts here!
You can see it, can't you, Myron? Gable and Lombard in Gone with the Wind.

[Miriam Hopkins has been suggested as a candidate to play Scarlett O'Hara]
Miriam Hopkins, George?

[Watching the party]
This is giving me the willies. I haven't seen so many phoney smiles since the losers of the last Academy Awards.
